straight up creepin.name: Straight Up Creepin'
straight up creepin.text:
When you scope out a person or place, roll + Mundane. On a 10+, ask two. On a 7-9, ask one. 
- whatâ€™s my best way in/out? 
- what happened here recently?
- what here is worth grabbing?
- who or what here is not what they seem?
- whose place is this?
On a miss, you find yourself in over your head. The GM will tell you why this is a bad spot.

directly engage a threat.name: Directly Engage a Threat
directly engage a threat.text:
When you directly engage a threat, roll +Danger. On a hit, trade blows. On a 10+, pick two. On a 7-9, pick one.
- resist or avoid their blows
- take something from them
- create an opportunity for your allies
- impress, surprise, or frighten the opposition

comfort or support.name: Comfort or Support
comfort or support.text: When you comfort or support someone, roll + Mundane. On a hit, they hear you: they mark potential, clear a condition, or shift Labels if they open up to you. On a 10+, you can also add a Team to the pool or clear a condition yourself.
